content: **note ** the sale of this pattern in whole or in part original or adapted is prohibited i ask that if you want to share it with someone or post the pictures of your spring pincushion do not forget to credit my new craft amigurumis so in addition to sharing your own work you also share mine and help me keep doing what i love the most heart **materials used** * círculo yarns amigurumi in colors 7625 castanha or light brown 7569 brigadeiro or brown 3077 quartzo or lighter pink 3131 chiclete or pink 3182 pitaya or darker pink and 5398 musgo or dark green * tapestry needle * pins and stitch markers * fiber for filling * craft glue * 5 cm round plastic or acrylic base optional this spring pincushion is approximately 7 5 cm **note ** if you prefer to use another yarn do not forget to adapt the hook and eyes to a size that is more suitable **happy crocheting **
